mapper.select: select seqid ,title ,writer ,hits ,to_char(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate ,to_char(udate,'yyyy-mm-dd') udate ,content from nboard order by seqid desc
select seqid ,title ,pass ,writer ,content ,hits ,rdate ,udate from nboard where seqid=#{seqid}
mapper.insert: insert into nboard( SEQID ,TITLE ,PASS ,WRITER ,CONTENT ,HITS ,RDATE ,UDATE ) values ( nboard_seq.nextval ,#{title} ,#{pass} ,#{writer} ,#{content} ,'0' ,sysdate ,'' )
mapper.update: UPDATE nboard SET hits=hits+1 WHERE seqid=#{seqid}
